name: Cargo Heli Transporter
description:
Cargo Heli Transporter is real huge ultimate extreme flying machines moving and transporting the cargo like foodstuff, cars, tanks, warheads and heavy duty machines. Once you play and simulate into this flying machines, you will forget other cargo plane games with standard car and air cargo transporter plane 3D as an ultimate airplane ace fighter jet pilot. The game revolves around a transportation business where you play the role of a Cargo Heli transporter & cargo contractor. Be a real cargo truck driver, an airplane pilot, a car transporter, a cruise ship sailor and a heavy crane operator. You have decided to open a transporter business. As the contractor you need to transport cargo, cars and other luggage via roads, sea and air. Take international transportation contracts and grow your business. The Cargo Heli Transporter game will take you on an adventure ride. Be an expert cargo helicopter transporter and pilot and transport all sorts of cargos from the port and city to the desired locations. Precision driving is required on your part as the best cargo Air Helicopter driver. Take on the role of a crane operator and load the freight into the helicopter. The safety and security of the expensive cargo is upon you now. Carrying cargo through aerial helicopter might be an easy task, but loading, unloading and carrying heavy cargo while you fly and simulate into helicopter is a different task.
Features:
• A Complete Transportation
• Real Experience of Driving Multiple Vehicles.
• Smooth and easy controls of all vehicles.
• Thrill of flying Plane & Sailing a Ship.
• Real-time Physics Controls of Driving Heavy Vehicles
